COMPANY UBER PARTNERS!

WE INVITE DRIVERS! ON YOUR CAR!

UBER is a dynamically developing company. The company occupies a leading position in the market amongtaxi companies, the company is absolutely transparent, you can control all processes in yourpersonalcabinet. Bonus system. In addition to the work performed on orders, the company calculates bonuses for peak time.

We are one of the partners and have established ourselves as one of the best teams in the city of Moscow. Our drivers earn from 80,000-120,000 per month.

SEND AN APPLICATION!
advantages

8 reasons to start working with us

No cash, payment is automatic
The cost of the trip is paid by the passenger from the linked bank card, i.e. no risks associated with the carriage of cash for both the passenger and the driver, you do not need look for small money for exchange.
Commission 8% + BONUSES
We have a minimum commission and we pay bonuses for each trip, some of our competitors keep bonuses to themselves. We work honestly and with us drivers earn more!
High income with guaranteed payments
We pay wages to the driver's personal bank card! You don't need to register LLC, individual entrepreneur, pay taxes, file a declaration, pay for accounting services and maintenance bank account.
Work at a convenient time, no schedules
You just press the button to get on the line to get started when you decide to finish, press exit the line. You can only earn extra money in the morning, evening, weekend, or holidays!
Comfortable, transparent and easy connection
We connect remotely and free of charge, you do not need to come to us! You send copies of documents to us, we register you and send you data for connection, in 1-2 days You can start working!
Always a large number of orders
The application shows where there are most orders at the moment and where the increased rates. You will not have idle and idle runs. Our passengers are always pleasant and absolutely non-conflict people who are pleasant to carry.
24/7 support
Uber has 24/7 email support for drivers. If something it is not clear, you can always ask a question through the On-line consultation.
Without checkers and stickers
You do not need to change the color, install "checkers" on the car and paste over it with stickers.

conditions and requirements

CONDITIONS: with your car:
  • We connect to the UBER system at 10%.
  • No contributions 0%!
  • We can connect remotely without coming to the office
  • IP is not required
  • Orders are distributed without rating to the nearest drivers
  • Work only by bank transfer
  • We transfer money to the card to the driver or in cash at the office
Daily earnings are 7000-12000r + bonus 3000t
rubles
УСЛОВИЯ: на авто компании:
  • We provide a car without collateral
  • No daily rental payments
  • Wednesday Friday and Saturday work for the company the rest of the days you work for yourself
DEMAND:
  • Having a car without ads
  • The car must not be yellow and not with yellow numbers
  • Car not older than 3 years
  • Driving experience at least 3 years
  • Device on the system android 4.0 and higher (samsung)
DOCUMENTS:
  • Rights 2 sides
  • Passport front side
  • StS
  • License (if any)
  • Phone number
  • Card number for money transfer (specify in the letter)!
